Module Contents

deeprules._helpers.get_bottom_level_conditions(condition: decision_rules.core.condition.AbstractCondition, parent_condition: decision_rules.conditions.CompoundCondition | None = None) → list[tuple[decision_rules.core.condition.AbstractCondition, decision_rules.core.condition.AbstractCondition]]

Decompose nested compound conditions to the list of tuples where first element is a bottom level condition and second one is its parent condition.

Args:

condition (AbstractCondition): compound condition parent_condition (Optional[CompoundCondition], optional): Optional parent condition. Defaults to None.

Returns:

list[tuple[AbstractCondition, AbstractCondition]]: list of tuples where first element is a bottom level condition and second one is its parent condition.

deeprules._helpers.get_nominal_indexes(df: pandas.DataFrame) → list[int]

Return indices of nominal columns in given dataframe

Args:

df (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame

Returns:

list[int]: list of indices of nominal columns

deeprules._helpers.get_numerical_indexes(df: pandas.DataFrame) → list[int]

Return indices of numerical columns in given dataframe

Args:

df (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame

Returns:

list[int]: list of indices of numerical columns
